sn29.21-50:1.2: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn29.21-50:1.3: “ko nu kho, bhante, hetu, ko paccayo, yena midhekacco kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā jalābujānaṃ nāgānaṃ …pe…
sn29.21-50:2.1: “Idha, bhikkhu, ekacco kāyena dvayakārī hoti, vācāya dvayakārī, manasā dvayakārī.
sn29.21-50:2.5: ‘aho vatāhaṃ kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā opapātikānaṃ nāgānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjeyyan’ti.
sn29.21-50:2.9: So kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā opapātikānaṃ nāgānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjati.
sn29.21-50:2.10: Ayaṃ kho, bhikkhu, hetu, ayaṃ paccayo, yena midhekacco kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā opapātikānaṃ nāgānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjatī”ti.
sn29.21-50:3.2: Evaṃ catūsu yonīsu cattālīsaṃ veyyākaraṇā honti.
sn29.21-50:3.3: Purimehi pana dasahi suttantehi saha honti paṇṇāsasuttantāti.)
